name: Lost Hotels
tag_list: travel, honeymoon, registry, adventure, activities, lodging, hotels, marketing
description: Be a traveler, not a tourist
overview:
Lost Hotels is a travel company combining a curated hotel directory offering off the beaten path independently owned properties around the world, and a one-stop-shop honeymoon and travel gift registry.

Unique destinations and experiences are hand selected by a team of expert travelers scouting properties that reflect the local flavor and unique personality of each destination while offering a high level of service.

Think independent and green properties, small-to-medium size, cool urban boutique hotels, Amazon jungle lodges and expedition cruises. This isn’t Paris in spring at the Ritz. This is Tango Mar in Costa Rica, Sacha Lodge in the Amazon rainforest, Turtle Inn in Belize, Titilaka in Peru, Hukumeizi and Casa Navegante in Colombia and Dunton Hot Springs in Colorado.
